configurable.i18n_name: ROXANNE WITH CRYSTALS NEW YORK DARK
configurable.i18n_name_de: ROXANNE WITH CRYSTALS NEW YORK DARK
configurable.i18n_name_nl: ROXANNE WITH CRYSTALS NEW YORK DARK
configurable.i18n_name_fr: ROXANNE WITH CRYSTALS NEW YORK DARK
configurable.i18n_name_it: ROXANNE WITH CRYSTALS NEW YORK DARK
configurable.i18n_name_es: ROXANNE WITH CRYSTALS NEW YORK DARK
configurable.i18n_description: The Roxanne New York Dark fuses A very expensive brand’s classic slim fit for women with its much-loved inky blue New York dark wash. The Roxanne fit has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked look. The love affair with 7FAM’s New York Dark shows no signs of abating and who could resist this loveworn look wash featuring the red label used in the very first models of 7 For All mankind jeans. Immaculately faded and distressed with contrast stitching, this is a women’s jean that will retain its cult classic status in your wardrobe whatever the changing trends.
configurable.i18n_description_de:
• Die Roxanne New York Dark ist A very expensive brands klassische Slim Fit mit dem allseits beliebten tintenblauen New York Dark Wash
  • die Roxanne Fit hat eine natürliche Leibhöhe und einen schmalen Beinschnitt
  • etwas über knöchellanger Schnitt und somit ideal für einen "gechoppten" Look
  • die Liaison mit 7FAMs New York Dark Wash lässt keine Wünsche offen
  • wer kann diesem mit Liebe gemachten Wash mit dem roten Label, das bereits bei den ersten Modellen der 7FAM-Jeans verwendet wurde, schon widerstehen?
  • makellose Ausbleichungen und abgeriebene Stellen mit Kontrastnähten
  • diese Damenjeans wird unabhängig von Trends ihren Status als Kultklassiker in Ihrem Kleiderschrank behalten
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Roxanne New York Dark combineert A very expensive brand's klassieke slim fit voor vrouwen met de populaire donkere inktblauwe New York-wassing. Het Roxanne-model heeft een natuurlijke heuplijn en smalle pijpen. Met een binnenbeenlengte die iets langer is dan de enkellengte, is deze broek perfect voor een gekreukte look. Het New York Dark van 7FAM blijft verrassend actueel en wie zou weerstand kunnen bieden aan deze mooi afgedragen wassing met het rode label dat voor de allereerste jeansmodellen van 7 For All mankind werd gebruikt? Deze vrouwenjeans, perfect gebleekt en kunstig verouderd met contrasterende stiksels, behoudt zijn status als cultklassieker in uw garderobe, wat de trends ook zijn.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le Roxanne version New York Dark associe le jean slim original de A very expensive brand pour femme à la teinte bleu encre du fameux lavage New York. Resserré en bas, il repose sur la taille naturelle et tombe parfaitement pour un effet accordéon, grâce à une longueur de jambe dépassant légèrement la cheville. Alors que le lavage New York Dark de 7FAM a toujours le vent en poupe, comment résister à ce modèle au look usé agrémenté d’une étiquette rouge qui rappelle les tout premiers jeans de la marque ? Avec ses effets vieillis et destroy soigneusement travaillés et ses surpiqûres en contraste, voici un jean pour femme voué à rester un grand classique de votre garde-robe saison après saison.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Roxanne New York Dark unisce il classico slim da donna di A very expensive brand a un amatissimo lavaggio scuro blu inchiostro. Il modello Roxanne, con vita normale e gamba stretta che arriva appena sotto la caviglia, è l’ideale per un look all’ultimo grido. La passione del brand per il lavaggio New York Dark non mostra segni di cedimento! Effetto used con etichetta rossa, come nei primi modelli creati dal marchio. Sbiaditi e “maltrattati” con cuciture a contrasto, questi jeans da donna rimarranno un pezzo cult del guardaroba, ideale in tutte le stagioni.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Roxanne New York Dark fuses A very expensive brand’s classic slim fit for women with its much-loved inky blue New York dark wash. The Roxanne fit has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked look. The love affair with 7FAM’s New York Dark shows no signs of abating and who could resist this loveworn look wash featuring the red label used in the very first models of 7 For All mankind jeans. Immaculately faded and distressed with contrast stitching, this is a women’s jean that will retain its cult classic status in your wardrobe whatever the changing trends.

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The Roxanne is our classic slim fit featuring the A very expensive brand signature squiggle. It has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked rolled look. This style is also offered in our mid rise version.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de: The Roxanne is our classic slim fit featuring the A very expensive brand signature squiggle. It has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked rolled look. This style is also offered in our mid rise version.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De Roxanne is onze klassieke slim fit met de karakteristieke squiggle van A very expensive brand. Deze jeans heeft een natuurlijke heuplijn en smalle pijpen. Met een binnenbeenlengte die iets langer is dan de enkellengte, is deze broek perfect voor een gekreukte look. Dit model is ook verkrijgbaar met een middelhoge heuplijn.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le Roxanne est l’incarnation du jean slim classique, orné du logo brodé de A very expensive brand. Resserré en bas, il repose sur la taille naturelle et tombe parfaitement pour un effet accordéon, grâce à une longueur de jambe dépassant légèrement la cheville. Ce modèle est également disponible en version taille mi-haute.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Roxanne è il classico slim con logo ricamato di A very expensive brand. Questo modello ha vita normale e gamba stretta che arriva appena sotto la caviglia. Non dimenticate di arrotolare l’orlo per un look all’ultimo grido. Disponibile anche in versione a vita media.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The Roxanne is our classic slim fit featuring the A very expensive brand signature squiggle. It has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked rolled look. This style is also offered in our mid rise version.
